title: Community mod for French demographic
body:
I, parogia propose to work for the Rari Capital DAO on a trial basis for 1 month as a mod for French based demographic.

  Background  
32 years French, Service Sales working for a big tech company and who recently became a Defi enthusiast.  First touch point with crypto in 2014, second one in 2020 and eventually I decided to step in (time + money ) only in 2021.
Jack of all trades, I have been working in multiple industries while having my regular job. E.g until 2020 I was also self-employed and managing a signed artist in a major record company.   

Abstract
I propose to work for the DAO in order build and moderate a French community.
Work will consist of two streams:
-Grow the French Rari community and attract it’s users in the discord channel.
-Moderate and manage the community by acting as two-way communication bridge between team and community regarding all announcements, feedback and so on.

At the end of the trial month, an assessment will be done with the DAO to determine wether or not it makes sense to renew the trial or discuss long term partnership.

Timeline
From June 16th until July 16th.   

Payment
$1000 worth of RGT
author: 0x8a37aa076fC0DF6C31a5Bb03aDA780f27c9e6108
